summary: This mod adds a new custom bow and arrows to the game (including quiver and projectiles).
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new custom bow and arrows to the game (including quiver and projectiles). To aquire the items you may either craft them under the Steel Smithing menu, or cheat your way there, by typing "help valiant" in the console and then using the ID together with the "player.additem" command.


[youtube]BzhvFkISjLs[/youtube] [youtube]mMJHWTpSJYQ[/youtube]
[youtube]Mw856F5n4R8[/youtube] [youtube]tv1x9QzXDys[/youtube]




[b]Smithing materials:[/b]

[u]Valiant Nord Bow:[/u]

- 2 x Steel Ingots
- 4 x Firewood
- 1 x Sabrecat tooth
- 2 x leather strips

[u]Valiant Nord Arrows (30)[/u]

- 2 x Steel ingot
- 2 x Firewood

[b]Stats:[/b]

[u]Valiant Nord Bow:[/u]
Base damage: 18
Weight: 13 Base
Value: 1400

[u]Valiant Nord Arrows (30)[/u]
- Damage 25
- Value 8
author: Corvalho
